thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: Kayla Anderson
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Kayla Anderson

author: Kayla Anderson
title: Kayla Anderson
text: The 2 Week Diet clearly explains why quickly burning fat in a safe way is important for keeping up motivation while explaining the science behind your weight gain. It then provides some easy, attainable goals for how to shed the pounds. I like how this book breaks down food groups in an easy-to-understand why and also provides a workout and motivation plans for staying on track.
